directoryOverview: Contains three versions of the CKFinder file browser library (CustomCkfinder, ckfinder, ckfinder2.4.1) - a third-party rich-text editor file management component used for uploading and managing files within the application. All files are CKFinder library source code, not application business logic.
keyWorkflows: File upload and management via CKFinder rich-text editor integration
Image resizing, thumbnail generation, and watermarking
Folder creation, renaming, deletion within CKFinder file browser
Access control and authentication for file operations
